codeSystems.name: DesignationUse
codeSystems.title: Designation Use
codeSystems.description: Details of how a designation would be used

codeSystems.name: FilterOperator
codeSystems.title: FilterOperator
codeSystems.description: The kind of operation to perform as a part of a property based filter.

codeSystems.name: Jurisdiction ValueSet
codeSystems.title: Jurisdiction
codeSystems.description:
This value set defines a base set of codes for country, country subdivision and region    for indicating where a resource is intended to be used.   
   
   Note: The codes for countries and country subdivisions are taken from    [ISO 3166](https://www.iso.org/iso-3166-country-codes.html)    while the codes for "supra-national" regions are from    [UN Standard country or area codes for statistical use (M49)](http://unstats.un.org/unsd/methods/m49/m49.htm).

codeSystems.name: CommonLanguages
codeSystems.title: Common Languages
codeSystems.description: This value set includes common codes from BCP-47 (http://tools.ietf.org/html/bcp47)

codeSystems.name: PublicationStatus
codeSystems.title: PublicationStatus
codeSystems.description: The lifecycle status of an artifact.

codeSystems.name: elga-administrativegender
codeSystems.title: ELGA_AdministrativeGender
codeSystems.description:
**Description:** The gender of a person used for adminstrative purposes (as opposed to clinical gender).

**Beschreibung:** Das Geschlecht einer Person zur administrativen Nutzung (entspricht nicht notwendigerweise dem biologischen oder medizinischen Geschlecht).
